story.storykicker: Maheck Chahal, who's all set to play an evil spirit in Kawach, is not shooting for her show these days due to her injury.
story.storybody:
Beautiful Maheck Chahal is in pain these days. The glamorous actress who's all set to play an evil spirit in Kawach--the show that will replace Naagin--recently had a ligament tear and fracture in her knee while attending a kickboxing class.

"While doing a kickboxing class I had a ligament tear and chip fracture in my right knee. Need ur love and blessings," Maheck  tweeted.

The fitness freak is out of action now, and that has also affected her shooting schedule. Maheck who plays Manjulika in Kawach, met with this accident on Sunday.

While doing a kickboxing class I had a ligament tear and chip fracture in my right knee.Need ur love and blessings???? pic.twitter.com/87UNicdMhu

ï¿½?? Maheck Chahal (@MaheckChahal) June 3, 2016
According to sources, the actress has got 3-4 days off to recover from her injury; meanwhile she's keeping her fingers crossed.  "I can't predict the future but right now I am on pain killers and very much part of the show. I will resume shooting on June 4. I will be meeting a specialist soon and then I will be in a better position to decide. He is one of the top doctors from Ambani hospital. He is a physiotherapist for Mumbai Indian's team so I am just keeping my fingers crossed and praying I will be fine soon. I am walking on crutches,"  the actress told TOI.

We wish Maheck a speedy recovery!

Kawach will premiere on June 11 at 8pm on Colors. It will replace Colors' top show Naagin.
